website_summaries.verdict: A solid, well-crafted fountain that looks particularly beautiful at night thanks to its LED lighting.
pros: Padded feet prevent scratching and minimize vibration hum
LED lighting looks very nice, particularly at night
cons: Some reports of this option being particularly prone to splashing
Leaks if you put too much water into it

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This fountain is very beautiful and has very low pump noise. Even at about 15 feet the splashing sounds are heard at a nice volume. No splashing as of yet (1 week). Lights are a great touch and make a pretty water scene on the wall in the dark. We put ours in a planter tray from home depot with some rocks from the back yard. Threw in some fake grass from Ikea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I received the fountain and it was just as I ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the fountain and it was just as I wanted and described. However about three weeks after using it, the fountain started leaking and I was unable to find the source of the leak. Tried to get a new one shipped, but unable to reach the seller. So not sure if this one was just defective, or if it is a design issue.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Van Brocklin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fountain..the pump has adjustable flow on it...set it right and it won't splash..it does not leak. It's quiet, I can only hear the water trickling. Very relaxing and the lights put a pretty water glimmer on the wall and ceiling. Love it, I might buy another style from Sunnydaze.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: Very relaxing and pleasant sound
customer_reviews.text: I have this piece sitting on my cubicle counter and have gotten many compliments. The LEDs bring out the falling water nicely. I got it super fast and working great so far. The pump is very quite and water fall sound helps me relax and keep pleasant attitude at work.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Walderrama

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Gurgling Fountain
customer_reviews.text: The fountain arrived very quickly on a Sunday even. This was packaged very protectively. Easy assembly but I followed advice from previous review n set flow to med instead of instructions saying high. I can't hear any pump noise just lovely bubbling gurgles as soft background. I set it on a tray in case there might be any splatter as previous reviewer encountered BUT I've had no splatter perhaps due to using med setting. The LED lights make pretty patterns on ceiling at night. The painting n design r well done. Friends have all complimented me on how beautiful it is.
customer_reviews.author: sir_monet

customer_reviews.title: Best tabletop waterfall I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tabletop waterfall. It is the best one I have ever owned. The motor is so quiet all you hear is the water. (As suggested, I do use distilled water.) When it is running in a darkened room the water and lights create quite a nice " light show" on the wall and ceiling! We needed to shorten the plastic hose that attached to the motor as the original, longer length was preventing the motor from sticking to the floor of the waterfall. Once we figured that out it's been it's been hassle free!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy

customer_reviews.title: I love this little fountain
customer_reviews.text: I love this little fountain. It looks exactly the same as pictured. Only problem I had was after the initial set up I wanted to turn the pump down to minimize "spitting" (I've never seen a fountain that didn't have a drop or two bounce out) and the faceplate came off, now the flow won't adjust well. I did get it to a good level and am very happy with it. Nice during the day and even better at night with the water and lights casting shimmering light on the ceiling. Noise level is good too, I can hear it but not too loud to be bothersome. All in all a great purchase. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary F

customer_reviews.title: Chemicals that cause cancer
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this fountain till I read the tag attached to it saying the chemicals involved to make the waterfall made lab rats get cancer. Now I am worried about touching it too much. the light reflection with the light off is awesome and the pump is not too loud as long as you submerge it.
customer_reviews.author: Established Writer

customer_reviews.title: Tag that came attached to item says materials can cause cancer and reproductive problems!
customer_reviews.text: this fountain is so lovely, but it came with a tag that says the fountain contains materials known to cause cancer and reproductive problems?? I’m worried about this, and I’m a bit frustrated that this warning was nowhere to be found in the online product description. The tag also doesn’t say WHICH problematic materials the product contains, so I can’t do my own research or gauge how worried I should be. If anyone has more info about this, please do let me know
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Rovine

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing, perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a fountain just like this for a long time now. This one was packaged beautifully and was super easy to set up. I took others advice and got a terracotta plant tray and added rocks and a couple fake plants. Love it! The sound isn't too loud or too soft. I don't hear the motor only the lovely water falling. Even my cat enjoys it. Lol
customer_reviews.author: kehauwTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good fountain
customer_reviews.text: Just got the fountain in the mail and set it up. Very easy set up. Very relaxing. Bit bigger than a bowling ball in size. Great size for a night stand or desk. If it lasts for a long time then I will be very pleased with it! The ONLY visually unappealing part of it is the black mesh on the second tier that prevents water splatter. However, its nicer to listen to and enjoy the fountain with the lights off anyways so its no big deal. Good lil fountain!
customer_reviews.author: JoePat627

customer_reviews.title: Defective water tight connector
customer_reviews.text: one of four water tight connections was assembled with the connection coupling backward. There is no way to correct this without cutting the fiber optic cord. Disappointed! Worried the next one will not be any better. Quality Control???
customer_reviews.author: Paul S.

customer_reviews.title: Became loud
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this because the pump became so loud after a couple days of running it. I followed the advice that I saw in the comments section about how to set it up and run it properly etc. Nothing I did made the pump shup up. I even shortend the tube a bit so it would sit flush. I wanted to like it but I've moved on.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Day 1 awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very very nice fountain I was apprehensive but after reading reviews and all the fountains. However they want as well excellent easy to set up. If there was only one thing I would do different would be add instructions that pertain to this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kandu

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this fountain. Nice sound of trickling water and the lights make the water shimmer. The only problem is as several other reviewers noted, the back access panel leaks like a sieve. Plan on caulking around it before you fill it with water.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Add gem stones to make it way for cool
customer_reviews.text: The lights are a little bright and want this for the water noise in the bed room. No problem, bought these and Dremeled them out to fit over the lights and it's 10 times better. Super Z Outlet Acrylic Colorful Round Treasure Gemstones for Table Scatter, Vase Fillers, Event, Wedding, Arts & Crafts, Birthday Decorations Favor (36 Pieces) (Assorted)
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful waterfall, but needs improvement...
customer_reviews.text: Attractive & I love the lighting & gentle waterfall sound... However, the directions were non-existent & I still don't know how to hide the 4 wires coming from the back... Improvements need to be made...
customer_reviews.author: Jude Kost

customer_reviews.title: check carefully no instructions
customer_reviews.text: no real instructions. noticed loose wires on my own and tightened before use. pump louder than water. beautiful but not what I expected from description.
customer_reviews.author: rappster

customer_reviews.title: Had broken pieces inside of the fountain.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great fountain once you use Flex Seal to ensure it won't leak. When I took it out of the box, I could hear pieces inside. I removed them and proceeded with the Flex Seal. So far, so good. It is actually a very pretty fountain and I love the water sound from it.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie  Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Previously USED :( included Human Hair, Wet Item, Broken Packaging.
customer_reviews.text: This item is have been previously Used. The box having "Human Hair" also the broken packaging, and the wet Water Fall. It is having Mark "N" on it with the Red pen. I am so disappointed with that. That is the only reason I am returning the item.
customer_reviews.author: Sidra

customer_reviews.title: Beauty of a fountain
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this fountain . It came in good time and was packaged well. It is beautiful with a very quiet pump , but lovely peaceful trickling water sounds . The water does not splash over onto the furniture . Extremely easy to assemble . I'm thinking of buying another . I recommend it highly .
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Bennett

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in the size and sound of the water. I sounds like a coffee maker brewing...more if a dripping sound rater than a flowing sound. I would have returned it but the UPS store is too far away to justify the time and mileage. One good thing about this is the lights that shine on the water...use it for a night light.
customer_reviews.author: Marie W.

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than the pictures show
customer_reviews.text: Just received it today it's beautiful and it has more lights than I thought it's way prettier than it looks on the pictures on here. It's very quiet too! I usually don't comment on a product the first day I get it so I hope I didn't put bad luck on myself. 😂
customer_reviews.author: Happygirl3

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This fountain is perfect. Exactly what I wanted for my office at work. Motor is completely quiet and the running water is the perfect level of sound. Great quality, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superdooperawesomeandstuff
customer_reviews.text: The pump is kinda hard to adjust sometimes, but I wouldn't call it a hassle. The pump is quiet and it's a very nice fountain. I found it needed some rocks to help with the splashing. The bottom basin does tend to splash a LOT so it isn't the best to just take out of the box, set down and run unless it's outdoors or similar use. I find it fun to be able to customize it though, it makes my living room very serene and is never a bother.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great fountain!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to add to our fairy garden this summer! It is going to be just perfect! Looks very realistic! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Romanowski

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and calming
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I think the pump got a little clogged during initial use, a few days. I cleaned it and seems to be doing better.
customer_reviews.author: TSM

customer_reviews.title: Nice splash sounds
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes this fountain; it has a nice sound but is not too loud. The only thing is we have to put a towel next to it 'cause it splashes and then it mildews if you don't wipe the surface.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and get compliments on how it sounds...like the real thing...you can actually hear the water falling.
customer_reviews.author: rim country woman

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I just got my fountain today. As many comments have stated it is easy to start using. Just pull it out of the box, add water, and plug it in. The only thing that troubles me is the weird warning that was attached to the fountain. The warning says that the fountain can cause cancer and birth defects. Does anyone know why they would need that warning?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Apartment size nature
customer_reviews.text: This baby looks like real wood. It splashes a little but that only adds room for decorating to solve the issue. A tray made to look like a rocky creek solves that issue. If you want loud water noise, this is not the one. This just has a light water tinkling sound.
customer_reviews.author: C. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Safety of the power plug
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, sound is soothing, reflected light is wonderful. I have one concern and it's the safety of the plug. I've noticed that it gets very warm or hot, I've tried various resepticals around my home all have had the same problem. Really is a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Atticus F.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: My son, who loves waterfalls, picked this out as a gift for his daycare provider. It is beautiful, easy to put together, and just the perfect amount of "white noise". The under lighting is a stunning addition. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli E

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love this fountain . The water makes a soft ripple sound perfect for our lanai. Glad I chose this.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: When the fountain arrived there were obvious issues to the power cord, because when we plugged it in nothing happened. I emailed “serenity health and home decor” and when I explained the issue, they mailed all new power cords and wiring (at no charge to me and no need to return old wiring). Fountain works great and sounds and looks beautiful. Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: KMapes

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love this fountain. Nice water sound, can't really hear the motor. Easy to set up. I placed a few clear, colored stones over the lights and created a blue-green hue. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described, works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was shopping for a small tabletop water fountain and this is exactly what I hoped for! It's the perfect size for my living room and we've had it running for a week now. The sound is very relaxing and it isn't too loud. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: CSBCGUC

customer_reviews.title: STARTS LEAKING AFTER 7 WEEKS OR SO
customer_reviews.text: AFTER 4 WEEKS THE LINING STARTS TO COME OFF!! THEN, 3 WEEKS LATER THE WATER STARTS TO SOAK THROUGH THE BOTTOM AND LEAK EVERYWHERE!!! IM SO DISAPPOINTED WITH THIS, THIS IS SOMETHING I REALLY HAD TO HAVE AND NOW BECAUSE ITS DEFECTIVE; IT SERVES NO MORE PURPOSE!! TOTAL LET DOWN.. IT WAS BEAUTIFUL WHEN IT FIST SHOWED UP, NOW IT SHALL BE TRASH. SMH
customer_reviews.author: Elliott

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with the AC power cord. Can't use.
customer_reviews.author: mcssufferer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Fountain
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful fountain but a little pricey for the size
customer_reviews.author: Linda R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this table top fountain. If you are looking for something unique then look no further. So relaxing after a long day!
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: zen fountain
customer_reviews.text: I love this fountain. It has a calming sound and the lighting creates a great shadow on the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Came next day delivery  thats awesome
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful my cousin is so happy. I'm glad she loved ,
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fall asleep to
customer_reviews.text: Love it. So peaceful to listen to. Love the adjustable switch on pump
customer_reviews.author: Cosmo

customer_reviews.title: Loud Fountain
customer_reviews.text: If your wanting a really loud fountain this one is for you. Works great and really doesn't splatter. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Docmarq

customer_reviews.title: On/off
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He loves it. We just would have liked a switch to be able to turn it off and on instead of having to unplug it. Also, having the option to have the light on or off while it’s running would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The settings are nice. The fountain does spray a little bit on the lowest setting, quite a bit on the highest setting. I use a clear acrylic cutting board underneath to keep water off my desk. I love the fountain and it provides relaxing background noise.
customer_reviews.author: TCB309

customer_reviews.title: Its great
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing looks like real wood. The back panel is easy to assemble. The only thing is. I thought the lights changed color or were blue or purple. But they are white. Still looks absolutely amazing and can see the water waves at night on ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Arica

customer_reviews.title: Second time I ordered this... Both broken!
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box and took it out still in the Styrofoam. When I attempted to take the top portion of the Styrofoam off I saw immediately that the the foundation is, not just broken, it is in crumbles!
customer_reviews.author: Lynnmarie

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this fountain!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this fountain. Great trickling sound and easy to put into operation. Improvements would include an on/off switch for power and the LED lights. Minor splashing near base.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: A little noisy
customer_reviews.text: Is nice, bur the pomp is noisy and there is not the possibility to lower the flow of water, so is impossible to use as a relaxing night fountain.
customer_reviews.author: Eva P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with my waterfall. and the timing I got it was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool fountain. I hope it lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: Cool fountain. I hope it lasts a long time! Lights are so bright that I used a sharpie to darken them. You wont be disappointed if you use this as a nightlight or something haha. Looks exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beauty in a waterfall
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive...very pleased with the way the water cascades down... had many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Zen Fountain
customer_reviews.text: I truly love this fountain, the sound it makes really takes you away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The led lights are brighter than expected and can’t turn off when the pump is running. The pump is quiet and flows nice with a tranquil babbling brook sound
customer_reviews.author: Brian badstuebner

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: Thing came completely broken. Plug it in and filled it. No lights, no pump, just a burning hot ac adapter and cord. Useless. Check your products before you send them.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Howard

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This product is worth the money. I am genuinely enjoying it. I would purchase this item again as a gift for someone. Well made, I love my waterfall.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Shand

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fall of water , amazing sound, no splash provided it is at the correct level of water, I've tried and it must be with plenty of water.
customer_reviews.author: Blas Zaccaro

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fountain
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this beautiful fountain. The sound of the water is so calming, bringing tranquility.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Leaks!
customer_reviews.text: It leaks! I’ve had it in a Vivarium for a few weeks now and I’ve just now noticed that it leaks from the bottom. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: can't believe it did't last two weeks and I had to fix it
customer_reviews.text: hope the fix lasts longer than the first one but my concerns what happens the next time . this is not a cheap price for an inferior product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lighted waterfall is very nice
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I were both very happy with the fountain
customer_reviews.author: Davesbelair

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully done, very relaxing
customer_reviews.text: I live it so realistic, gentle sound and the lights make it very relaxing to watch
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and cute
customer_reviews.text: I love my water fountain! So in love with the water sound!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has to be filled daily, sometimes twice, which makes it more of a chore than an enjoyment
customer_reviews.author: suddenleesun

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product came on time and was exactly as described. Works well, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Martin

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: This fountain arrived in 50 pieces! Boxes undamaged. So sad.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Serenity!
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Exactly as described. Nice and peaceful during these trying times.
customer_reviews.author: Dashaun Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Table top fountain ⛲️
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Used it for myself. Will make a great gift
customer_reviews.author: Manjit Kaur

customer_reviews.title: Has a very nice sound to it
customer_reviews.text: Fountain is as described. Has a very nice sound to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J Hansen

customer_reviews.title: I really love it, so
customer_reviews.text: Yes , I really love it , so ...relax !!
customer_reviews.author: Ming Feng Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's great I don't understand the bad reviews easy setup and sounds great 👍
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this fountain. Nice addition to sunroom. Pleasing sound.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Fountain is beautiful to behold
customer_reviews.text: A+. Quick shipping. Well packed. Wonderful product. Prettier than the picture. Wife I delighted with sight and sound. Thank you. M
customer_reviews.author: George Thomas

customer_reviews.title: water fall look great and I love it
customer_reviews.text: Already used for 1.5 month no issue were found,water fall look great and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amran Bin Atan

customer_reviews.title: table top fountain
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a different one and had trouble with the pump falling apart inside the hole in the back. Once I fixed that, the pump worked great. Then after about 4 hours of use, one of the lights stopped working. I see nothing anywhere that would show me how to get it fixed so I returned it which was easy to do. I have run this one a little longer, so far so good. I really like it so I am hoping that the lights continue to work.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lee

customer_reviews.title: We've found it to be great. After adding up the price of massages for ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use in our spa room at our home. We've found it to be great. After adding up the price of massages for a year between us we decided to buy a table and convert a small bedroom into a mini spa room upstairs. We've had no splashing/leaking problems at all with this product. I'd reccomend it highly. The sound is delightful and not overly loud at all.
customer_reviews.author: SeaMist

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It made the entry corner of my home so beautiful. I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for Boss's Day and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Minges

customer_reviews.title: SO great, but splashes
customer_reviews.text: Oh, I wish I could rate it higher, because I love, love, LOVE this fountain. As others have noted, it has a great aesthetic, the paintjob is terrific, the sound is fantastic and the LED lights add so much. At night, they're other-worldly. HOWEVER, as others have also mentioned, it splashes. For me, not much -- very little, actually, but even a tiny bit is enough to ruin a tabletop in not much time. I did find a good solution, though. I went to the nursery and bought a nice 14" ceramic pot liner, set the fountain in it and filled it with small stones. It actually has a terrific look, but we, the consumers, shouldn't have to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Don Heller Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Very little water flow
customer_reviews.text: The pictures and videos of this fountain are very misleading. I ordered a few fountains from Sunnydaze and have received two. Both pumps are two weak for the actual fountains. This one doesn’t have a waterfall thing going at all like it does in their pictures. It pumps enough for a little trickle of water and that’s it. The other one I received was supposed to have water flowing two different directions but again only pumped enough where half the fountain works. The other side of the fountain has no water flow at all.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Rector

customer_reviews.title: Possible the best fountain I've purchased and decorated
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I have to take the time to write a brief review, please check pictures and video, this is by far one of the best fountains one can buy and I really do not have anything bad to say other than the wires for the LEDs. I love the sound of nature and the look, this fountain is top tier because YOU CAN DECORATE IT EASILY also the sound is on par with actual creeks / rivers ( added in rocks where the water touches the pools to make it more natural )
customer_reviews.author: InSaNiTy

customer_reviews.title: Splashes and leaks really, really bad...
customer_reviews.text: Edward Snowden has nothing on this fountain.... Seriously. Originally I gave this 5 stars, but after a few weeks of trying to get it to not leak, I have had no luck. I followed everyone's advice and put it in a planter's water catcher and surrounded it with rocks and plants.... but I still have to mess with it every few days. It runs out of water every two to three days because it splashes so much, and it's a bummer. I love the ascetic, but the hassle is too much.
customer_reviews.author: A. C.

customer_reviews.title: Realism
customer_reviews.text: This fountain definitely needs to be dressed up to bring out its realism. It does leak a wee-bit, but if you put it in a plant saucer, add rocks and faux plants it's great. I have the pump set at mid-way and that adds just enough waterfall effect. To turn it off you do have to unplug it, so I have it plugged into a small power strip to allow me to turn on-off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fountain as a birthday gift for my husband. I shopped very carefully and read reviews on many table- top fountains. Overall, we've been very pleased. It typically does not leak, but to be on the safe side, we did not put it on a wood table. Occasionally, there is some water on the table, but we put it on a glass-topped desk, so there's no problem. It goes almost a week without having to have water added. It's very pretty at night with the lights, the water sound is very nice, and the size is perfect. I'd recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon G.

customer_reviews.title: Re: Beautiful but splashes
customer_reviews.text: While this is a beautiful fountain and the sound is very relaxing it leaks and splashes horribly!! I have to put a towel under mine and change it every few hours when it is soaked. If you do not cover the pump with water it is loud, if you do it over flows. I am going to try the suggestion of the ceramic pot bottom with rocks. Disappointed at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my fountain
customer_reviews.text: Love my fountain! I have it with a timer to turn on an off several times of the day. Does not splash like other people comment. I use distilled water to prevent from bacteria to build up. The light and the sound is great
customer_reviews.author: carmen figueroa

customer_reviews.title: So peaceful, Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I have had mine set up for a couple weeks now, and love it! Its so peaceful, the motor is very quite and the sound of the water isn't too loud and its not too soft. This is a great buy and I would recommend it. Would suggest refilling it every time before you plug it in, and if you hear weird motor sounds its because it needs more water for the motor to be fully submerged.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. Splashes a bit.
customer_reviews.text: Adjusting the sounds made by each of the three pools with pebbles made it amazingly nice. It was too loud for the bedroom without them. It does splash a fair amount of water out the front on the lowest setting, but pebbles also minimized this to a manageable level. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful fountain but water flow is slight. No sound.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: leaks, but looks great
customer_reviews.text: Updating my review. Fountain tends to leak a lot. I've handled it with great care but it leaks. I'll put it down and run it for a couple minutes and pick it up to find a huge pool of water underneath, therefore I can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Still satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Lovely sound and aesthetic; I turn it on every night to help me sleep. It does tend to splash a bit onto the table, which is why I docked it a star. Still satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie D

customer_reviews.title: The fountain is beautiful and well crafted
customer_reviews.text: The fountain is beautiful and well crafted. I purchased it to help me sleep at night and it is doing just that! The lights create a nice atmosphere and are not too bright for me. The fountain itself sounds like a babbling brook and is very relaxing. The water stays contained within the feature and is adjustable. And Although it wasn't purchased for my cats, they are enjoying it too!
customer_reviews.author: A.Barket

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We love the sound of the water and the flickering lights. Very quiet pump. It does sprinkle a little water so we put it in a big dish.
customer_reviews.author: Gina S

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This fountain is very nice! Great quality, pretty sound & good size!! There is a little splashing but if you add water every other day it's minimal. I leave it on all the time when i'm home. It's perfectly tranquil & soothing! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cascading flow
customer_reviews.text: Easy breezy installation. Quiet motor and the water flow is perfect. I love the light by the way. It's great for night when you're just laying down chilling or if you wake up in the middle of the night and you need to drink water, it's the perfect night light.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph W.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice fountain
customer_reviews.text: Cool design and quiet motor. Wish I could change the color of the bulb it’s too white unfortunately can’t replace the bulb to a different color . All in all it’s good and I love it. No leaks or splashes as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: JEM

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute waterfall but attaching the pump in the back was a little difficult even though I have relatively small hands and I wish there was a way to run the water without the lights.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tabletop falls. The first one I ordered was damaged. Customer service was great and shipped a replacement right away.
customer_reviews.author: MB

product_meta.title: Sunnydaze Cascading Caves Waterfall Tabletop Fountain with LED Lights - Corded Electric - Home Decor Accent Piece for Office, Bedroom or Living Room - 14 Inch
feature_bullets: OVERALL DIMENSIONS: 9 inches wide x 7 inches deep x 14 inches tall; weighs 6 pounds

SPECIAL FEATURES: Includes foot pads to prevent scratching surfaces and LED lighting to illuminate the fountain *Colors may vary slightly from on-screen images; Computer monitor settings and different lighting environments can make product color appear differently
RELAXING SOUND: Quiet submersible electric pump included so you can pay more attention to relaxing
QUICK & EASY ASSEMBLY: Just fill and place it on any flat surface in your home or office; Fountain also includes camouflaged back side door for easy access to the pump and light
WORRY-FREE PURCHASING: Sunnydaze Decor backs its products with a 1-year manufacturer's warranty for worry-free purchasing
